content: knit 8 10 / 11 wrap 1 turn continue working short row until 5 5 / 6 sts remain unwrapped with right side facing knit short row sts until first wrapped stitch slip st to right hand needle with left hand needle pick up the wrap collar around the wrapped st slip st back to left hand needle and knit wrap and st together turn continue working short row until are wrapped stitches are worked leg right side facing continue knitting rounds after finishing your last short row to prevent holes between short row and front pick up the horizontal strand from back to front between last heel st and front knit twisted loop and first stitch of front together repeat with last st of front and first st of heel sts knit another 3 3 / 4 rounds start in ribbing knit 1 purl 1 and work 6 7 / 8 rounds bind off loosely ***
